name: Swedish Medical Association
membership:
The Standing Committee of European Doctors (CPME)
The European Union of Medical Specialists ( UEMS)
goal: To promote the interest of our members.
interests: Employment and Social Affairs, Internal Market, Public Health
euInitiatives:
The implementation of the new professional qualifications directive in Sweden and in other EU member states.
As well as working towards exclusion of the medical professions out of the Regulation of professions: Proportionality test, anti- microbial resistance, eHealth initiatives.
